exceptions.tactic: intros a u l H0 H1.
intros a' u l H0 H1.
intros a' u' l H0 H1.
intros a' u' l' H0 H1.

original: intros a u l H0 H1. unfold is_LimInf_seq in *. unfold Rbar_mult. destruct l. - intros H2 eps. specialize (H1 eps). destruct H1 as [H1a H1b]. split. + intros N. specialize (H1a N). destruct H1a as [n [H2a H2b]]. exists n. split. * apply H2a. *
